<p>
**What's new?**  
How can we reconstruct past climates from patchy and spatially biased records? We address this question in our new paper published in *Climate of the Past*. 🌍🌡️❓

::: {style="margin-top: auto;"}
<a href="https://doi.org/10.5194/cp-20-349-2024" class="card-link heading-font">ACCESS</a>
:::

Does Global Plate Model choice matter? We address this question in our new paper published in *Methods in Ecology and Evolution*. 🌍

::: {style="margin-top: auto;"}
<a href="https://doi.org/10.1111/2041-210X.14204" class="card-link heading-font">ACCESS</a>
:::

The article introducing our new [palaeoverse R package](http://palaeoverse.palaeoverse.org)--a community-driven toolkit for streamlining palaeobiological analyses and improving code accessibility and reproducibility--is now published in *Methods in Ecology and Evolution*. 🪸🦕</p> 

::: {style="margin-top: auto;"}
